name: VR Crypto Vegas
summary: Crypto Vegas VR, developed by Metaprolane, stands as a Metaverse-based virtual casino gaming platform. This immersive platform prioritizes security and transparency, enhancing the gaming experience while adhering to legal standards. Crypto Vegas compatible with various platforms, supporting VR controllers for an interactive experience. As Crypto Vegas VR launches BlackJack, Andar bahar, Baccarat, users can anticipate an exciting array of games like Poker, Roulette, Spin Wheel, and Slot Machines.
